documentation.text:
Based upon ECDSA library from OpenZeppelin Solidity
 https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/cryptography/ECDSA.sol

Based upon ECDSA library from OpenZeppelin Solidity
 https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/cryptography/ECDSA.sol

recover(bytes32,bytes).details: Recover signer address from a message by using their signature

params.hash: bytes32 message, the hash is the signed message. What is recovered is the signer address.
params.signature: bytes signature, the signature is generated using web3.eth.sign()

userdoc.notice: Based upon ECDSA library from OpenZeppelin Solidity https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-solidity/blob/master/contracts/cryptography/ECDSA.sol
